Capture all the criminals to win the level.
Capture all the criminals. The dog can block criminals, and the lightning makes you faster.
Capture all the criminals. The dog can block criminals, and the lightning makes you faster.
Capture all the criminals, and don't forget to use your items!
Catch the speedy criminal. Use the speed boosts to run faster.
Catch the speedy criminal. The barricades will block your movement.
Catch the speedy criminal. Be sure to hit all the speed boosts.
Catch all of the criminals that appear.
The criminal in handcuffs is walking to the patrol car. Make sure he gets there without any of the other criminals freeing him.
Guard the criminal in handcuffs. Criminals may come from all sides.
Guard the criminal in handcuffs. Keep an eye out for magnets to stop the Brutes.
Guard the criminal in handcuffs. There will be lots of kinds of criminals this time.
Keep the criminals from running away with the gems.
Keep the criminals from running away with the gems.
Protect the gems. Use the dog to block the criminals.
Protect the gems. You'll need to act quickly this time!
Use the magnifying glasses to spot the hiding criminals.
Find the hidden criminals all around the level.
Find the hidden criminals scattered throughout the level
Find the hidden criminals. There are lots of them, so be careful where you look!
Use the arrow keys to move and climb ladders. Hit the space bar to pick up, drop, and use items.
Touch criminals to put them in jail.
Speedy criminals have skateboards that make them quick. If you pick up a skateboard, you'll move faster too.
Sneaky criminals hide behind objects in the background. Use the magnifying glass to find them.
Jailbreaker criminals can free other criminals from jail. Place the dog in front of them to stop them from running.
Brute criminals can't be captured as long as they have their clubs. Drop the magnet in front of them to take the club away and turn them into normal criminals.
Go
Good job! You held off the criminals!
Great job! Protected all of the civilians!
Oh no! They stole all the valuables!
Congratulations! You got 'em!
Congratulations! You got 'em in Expert time!
Oh no! You ran out of time!
Good job! You moved the criminal!
Good job! The criminal was never freed!

Programming: Clayton Grey
Art Direction: Mathew Moss
Animation: Joe Wierenga
Game Art: Sam Strick
Game Design: Nick Fortugno, Ben Hayes
Audio: Gina Zdanowicz
Producer: Xiao Hui Chin, Stefan Stokkeb√¶k
Educational Consultant: Karen Sideman
